info.title: Page map index manager.
info.description: Creates a map for the pages including folders and pages.

prop.name: folderPath
prop.description: The folder path of the file.

parameter.name: $folderPath
parameter.description: The folder path for the map file.

parameter.name: $mapFile
parameter.description: The map file name. By default the MAP_FILE constant is used.

method.name: createMapFile
method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: createFolder
method.description: Create a new folder in the map.

parameter.name: $parent
parameter.description: The parent folder to create the folder to. Separate each folder with "/".

parameter.name: $folder
parameter.description: The name of the folder to create.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: removeFolder
method.description: Remove a folder from the map. The folder must be empty of pages and other folders.

parameter.name: $folder
parameter.description: The parent folder to create the folder to. Separate each folder with "/".

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getFolders
method.description: Get an array of all the folders under the given path.

parameter.name: $parent
parameter.description: The folder to look down from. The default value is empty, for the root. Separate each folder with "/".

parameter.name: $compact
parameter.description: Whether to return a single compact array with folders separated by "/" or a nested array.

method.returndescription: A nested array of all the folders under the given path.

method.name: createPage
method.description: Create a page in the given folder. It updates the library index and creates a new page object.

parameter.name: $parent
parameter.description: The parent folder to create the folder to. Separate each folder with "/".

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: removePage
method.description: Remove a page from the map.

parameter.name: $parent
parameter.description: The parent folder to create the folder to. Separate each folder with "/".

parameter.name: $pageName
parameter.description: The page name to be removed.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: getFolderPages
method.description: Get all pages in a given folder.

parameter.name: $parent
parameter.description: The folder to look down from. The default value is empty, for the root. Separate each folder with "/".
